translation.en: What is the order of business for today?
Well, first things first, we have to get you settled in.
translation.it: Beh, prima di tutto, dobbiamo sistemarti.

translation.en: I haven't forgot I'm supposed to have an office.
translation.it: Non ho dimenticato che mi serve un ufficio.

translation.en: You know, naturally you will be in daddy's office which is right there.
translation.it: Naturalmente starai nell'ufficio di papà, che è lì.

translation.en: Odogwu's office, don't go there.
Ogodwu is the oracle of this company,
translation.it: Odogwu è l'oracolo di questa compagnia,

translation.en: I am not qualified to take his seat, no.
translation.it: non sono in grado di prendere il suo posto, no.

translation.en: Look, I don't need anything elaborate.
translation.it: Senti, non mi serve nulla di elaborato.

translation.en: This place is, this is perfect for me now.
This is good, yes it is.
This is good.
Uncle, are you sure?
Look, Ada-nna, if you want to spray insecticides
translation.it: Senti, Ada-nna, se vuoi spruzzare l'insetticida

translation.en: on cockroaches, snakes and scorpions,
you take yourself, get yourself a vantage position.
translation.it: ti devi mettere in una posizione di vantaggio.

translation.en: Here is a vantage position, so I can have my lens over, all over.
translation.it: Questa è una posizione di vantaggio, così vedo tutto.

translation.en: Don't worry.
Okay. If you insist.
I insist, my dear.
No problems. I'll work here.
Ma?
The external auditors are coming upstairs now. Right now.
translation.it: I revisori esterni stanno salendo. Ora.

translation.en: Okay. I will be in my office.
translation.it: Ok. Li aspetto nel mio ufficio.

translation.en: Uncle, I have a meeting with the external auditors.
translation.it: Zio, ho una riunione con i revisori esterni.

translation.en: I don't know if you would like to join me.
translation.it: Non so se vuoi unirti a me.

translation.en: -Is it necessary? Well, if it is-- -Yes, so please. Please.
translation.it: - È necessario? Beh, se lo è... - Sì, per favore.

translation.en: Alright.
Chameleon. Very good.
Thank you for coming. So, given our current situation
translation.it: Grazie di essere venuti. Dunque, data la nostra situazione attuale,

translation.en: can you tell us how bad the numbers are?
translation.it: potete dirci quanto sono brutti i numeri?

translation.en: Bad.
Try abysmal, madam.
But I could have told you that yesterday
translation.it: Ma gliel'avrei detto ieri, se non avesse annullato

translation.en: if you hadn't cancelled our appointment scheduled at--
translation.it: Ma gliel'avrei detto ieri, se non avesse annullato - il nostro appuntamento delle... - Dodici. Orario dell'Africa occidentale.

translation.en: 12:00 p.m., West African time.
translation.it: - il nostro appuntamento delle... - Dodici. Orario dell'Africa occidentale.

translation.en: I apologize.
I had an emergency so I had to--
[female auditor] We all have emergencies, Miss Obiagu.
translation.it: Abbiamo tutti delle emergenze, signorina Obiagu.

translation.en: For instance, I had an emergency appointment with a doctor today at--
translation.it: Ad esempio, io avevo un appuntamento d'emergenza con un medico oggi, alle...

translation.en: 9:00 a.m., West African time.
Again, I apologize.
Now if we can get back to-- [Godswill] No, no. Wait.
translation.it: - Ora se possiamo tornare... - No, aspetta.

translation.en: You said you had an emergency with the doctor.
translation.it: Ha detto che aveva un'emergenza medica.

translation.en: Could you tell us what the emergency was?
translation.it: Potrebbe dirci che tipo di emergenza?

translation.en: Teeth whitening.
With what paint?
This thing I'm seeing, it can't be whiter.
translation.it: Non potrebbero essere più bianchi di così.

translation.en: Throwing away your money.
Back to the numbers.
Yes.
Lionheart is in severe debt. Debt?
translation.it: - La Lionheart è piena di debiti. -Debiti?

translation.en: [in Igbo] You people are owing.
[in English] Nine hundred and fifteen million Naira.
What?
That's almost one billion!
-[female auditor] No. -Nine hundred and fifteen million Naira.
[female auditor] Your father took a loan from various banks last year.
translation.it: Suo padre ha chiesto prestiti da varie banche l'anno scorso.

translation.en: What was the loan for? Against our advice.
translation.it: - Per che cosa? - Contro il nostro parere.

translation.en: Chairman took a loan to acquire...
translation.it: Il presidente ha chiesto un prestito per comprare...

translation.en: [male auditor] One hundred luxurious buses.
For the BRT contract and now it's time to pay up.
translation.it: Per il contratto BRT, ed è ora di pagare.

translation.en: Okay. Let's not panic. So what do we do?
translation.it: Ok, niente panico. Quindi che facciamo?

translation.en: [in Igbo] Pay up your debt.
[in English] In 30 days.
Or, risk losing everything.
[female auditor] Good day.
Now, wait, auditor. Auditor.
Auditor.
No, wait, I have something to chip in.
One billion!
Why would Ernest go to borrow one billion? What for?
translation.it: Perché Ernest prenderebbe in prestito un miliardo?

translation.en: And without telling me.
In this recession.
Are you sure these people are telling the truth?
translation.it: Sei certa che questa gente dica la verità?

translation.en: Well we have to find out. I...
No, it's time to... Let's reach Odogwu.
translation.it: No, è ora di... parliamo con Odogwu.

translation.en: [Adaeze] So, daddy, the external auditors showed up today,
translation.it: Papà, oggi sono venuti i revisori esterni...

translation.en: talking about a loan that you took last year.
translation.it: ...dicendo che hai chiesto un prestito, l'anno scorso.

translation.en: Nine hundred and fifty million Naira, daddy.
Yes, Odogwu. [clears throat]
[in Igbo] I don't know how you took such an amount without telling anybody.
translation.it: Non so come hai potuto chiedere tutti quei soldi senza dirlo a nessuno. Mio Dio.

translation.en: "A man's response to an urgent matter
translation.it: "La risposta di un uomo a un problema urgente...

translation.en: determines his character."
Do you understand what I mean?
[in English] We needed buses to improve our fleet.
[Godswill] Agreed. That meant money.
I had no choice but to go to the bank and collect some money.
translation.it: Non ho avuto scelta se non prenderli dalla banca.

translation.en: -But, daddy-- -You know.
I think you took a huge gamble.
It's not like we've been guaranteed the BRT contract.
translation.it: Il contratto BRT non ci è stato garantito.

translation.en: That's another thing. You see, what's so important to me
translation.it: Quello è un altro punto. Quello che importa a me

translation.en: is the loan, and how the bank is going to recover--
translation.it: è come la banca si riprenderà i soldi.

translation.en: [in Igbo] Their approach is different when recovering their loan.
translation.it: È diverso quando si riprendono i soldi. Ti saltano alla gola.

translation.en: [in English] They will go for your blood when they come back.
translation.it: Ti saltano alla gola. Dovevano esserci delle alternative.

translation.en: [in Igbo] There should have been alternatives.
I agree with what you've said.
[in English] I got into this business,
principally to take people to various destinations in comfort...
translation.it: ...principalmente per portare la gente in vari posti, comodamente... e con stile.

translation.en: in style.
It has become a legacy with our company.
translation.it: È diventato il nostro marchio di fabbrica.

translation.en: If we lose that legacy, we have lost everything.
Daddy, but right now it seems like we have risked everything.
translation.it: Ma papà, ora sembra che abbiamo rischiato tutto.

translation.en: You've put us...
We've been put in such a vulnerable position right now, daddy,
translation.it: Ci troviamo in una posizione di vulnerabilità adesso, papà,

translation.en: and we don't have that much time on our side.
[Ernest] Because of that,
I've decided to invite your Uncle Godswill
translation.it: ho deciso di invitare tuo zio Godswill...

translation.en: to be a part of this establishment,
because I believe that two heads are better than one.
translation.it: Perché credo che due teste ragionino meglio di una.

translation.en: Let's see what comes out of the fridge, uh?
-Morning. -Good morning, Ma.
Morning.
Good morning, uncle.
You missed the morning devotion.
translation.it: Ti sei persa la preghiera mattutina.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I was working all night.
translation.it: Mi spiace. Ho lavorato tutta la notte.

translation.en: I came up with a plan, uncle.
It's something I call my three-point agenda.
translation.it: È quello che chiamo un progetto in tre fasi.

translation.en: Okay. This is good.
-Honestly, I must confess. -Yeah, thank you.
And, here...
take a look.
I've been doing some research myself.
A transport company in Kano
translation.it: Una compagnia di trasporti di Kano

translation.en: needs a merger with another company from Southeast,
translation.it: ha bisogno di fondersi con una compagnia del sudest,

translation.en: and we must not miss this.
translation.it: ed è un'occasione da non perdere.

translation.en: I don't think a merger is what we need right now, uncle.
translation.it: Non credo che una fusione sia ciò che ci serve ora, zio.

translation.en: Really? So what do we need?
translation.it: Davvero? E cos'è che ci serve?

translation.en: Trust me.
This is a plan that has been tried and tested.
translation.it: È un piano che ho già messo in pratica.

translation.en: It works.
So the first thing we need to do, is get an extension on the 30-day loan.
translation.it: La prima cosa da fare è ottenere un'estensione oltre i 30 giorni.

translation.en: I mean, technically 29 now,
and I've asked the accountant to set up meetings with all the banks that we owe.
translation.it: E ho chiesto al contabile di fissare degli appuntamenti con le banche.

translation.en: And I have one for today which is at...
translation.it: E ne ho un oggi, alle...

translation.en: now, so I have to go.
We have to go.
No, no, uncle, it's okay, I've got this.
translation.it: No, zio, va tutto bene, ce la faccio da sola.

translation.en: And, besides, you said one of us needs to stay here so--
translation.it: E oltretutto tu hai detto che uno di noi deve restare qui,

translation.en: It doesn't apply here. Listen.
translation.it: - perciò... - Non in questo caso. Ascolta.

translation.en: if we have to fight this war, Ada-nna, we have to fight it together,
translation.it: Se dobbiamo lottare, Ada-nna, dobbiamo farlo insieme,

translation.en: unless we want to lose.
So... I'm at your service, nationwide.
translation.it: Perciò sono a tua completa disposizione.

translation.en: Let's go.
I'm afraid I can't give you an extension.
translation.it: Temo di non potervi concedere un'estensione.

translation.en: [Adaeze] I can assure you we have a solid chance at the deal, we just need more time.
translation.it: Le assicuro che quel contratto è già nostro, ci serve solo tempo.

translation.en: I'm just asking for you to be patient with us.
translation.it: Le chiedo solo di avere un po' di pazienza.

translation.en: We're definitely going--
[in Igbo] Keep talking.
[in English] Go ahead and talk.
[man] I am so sorry.
It wasn't approved.
[Igwe] Use that against them.
Okay, sir.
But don't rush. Take your time.
translation.it: Ma niente fretta. - Prenditi tutto il tempo. - Sì, signore.

translation.en: Yeah. Okay, sir.
translation.it: - Prenditi tutto il tempo. - Sì, signore.

translation.en: -The minute they get there. -Yeah, I think they're here already.
translation.it: - Appena arrivano. - Sì, credo siano già qui.

translation.en: Good. Waste their precious time.
I'll handle it.
-I do not want to be disturbed. -I'll take care of it, sir.
translation.it: - Non voglio essere disturbato. - Ci penso io, signore.

translation.en: So, how can I help you, Mr. and Mrs. Obiagu?
translation.it: Allora, come posso aiutarvi, signori Obiagu?

translation.en: No, no. He's my uncle.
Yes, she's my niece. Okay, I see.
translation.it: - Sì, lei è mia nipote. - Ok, capisco.

translation.en: Anyway, we would like to apply for a loan.
We have the track record. We have collateral.
translation.it: Abbiamo la documentazione, e le garanzie.

translation.en: But most importantly, we have an impeccable reputation.
translation.it: Ma cosa più importante, la nostra reputazione è impeccabile.

translation.en: Impeccable reputation indeed.
I'm sorry, what's that supposed to mean?
Of course, everyone knows that Lionheart is presently facing bankruptcy.
translation.it: Naturalmente tutti sanno che la Lionheart al momento è in bancarotta.

translation.en: Plus your father, he's owing so many banks.
translation.it: E oltretutto suo padre ha debiti con molte banche.

translation.en: So how come you're asking for a new loan?
translation.it: Perciò perché chiedete un altro prestito?

translation.en: Well... We are not facing bankruptcy.
It's just... it's just the times that we're in.
translation.it: Sono solo... i tempi in cui ci troviamo.

translation.en: It's a minor setback, we'll pull through.
translation.it: Non è che un piccolo intoppo, sistemeremo tutto.

translation.en: It's okay, I expect you to say that.
translation.it: Va bene, mi aspettavo che l'avrebbe detto.

translation.en: Listen, as the manager,
we know the process of obtaining loans.
We're not kids.
Just tell us what it will take for us to get this loan. Finished. Simple.
translation.it: Ci dica cosa ci vorrà per ottenere questo prestito. E basta. Semplice.

translation.en: Well, I really don't understand.
What don't you understand, for Kingdom's sake?
Look, I give you, you give me. It's give and take. Everything has a price.
translation.it: Senta, una mano lava l'altra. Tutto ha un prezzo.

translation.en: Even life has a price. Tell us what it will take.
translation.it: Anche la vita ha un prezzo. Ci dica cosa ci vorrà.

translation.en: -Uncle, what are you doing? -I'm doing business.
translation.it: - Zio, che stai facendo? - Faccio affari.

translation.en: It's okay, sir, but I hope you are not trying to bribe me.
translation.it: Ok, signore, ma spero che non stia cercando di offrirmi una mazzetta.

translation.en: -Oh, God. -Oh, no, no... He's not--
Look, what do you mean by bribe?
Tell us what you're waiting for,
I will give it to you. I've told you name any price.
translation.it: e noi gliela diamo. Senza badare a spese.

translation.en: It's okay, it's okay. Calm down. You mean?
translation.it: Va bene, va bene. Si calmi. Vuole sapere...

translation.en: -Name anything. -My price?
Yes, your price.
Well...
your niece here is not looking bad at all. Excuse me?
translation.it: ...sua nipote non è affatto male. - Chiedo scusa?

translation.en: I mean, she's good.
My price.
Uncle, you shouldn't have.
[in Igbo] Abomination.
[Igwe] Yes.
He punched you?
What a savage.
I see.
Which police station?
Excuse me.
Do you know the people that you are toying with? Do you?
[in Igbo] You're finished.
[in English] Uncle, please, let's not make things any worse.
translation.it: Zio, per favore, non peggioriamo le cose.

translation.en: -They are right, we are wrong. -Says who?
translation.it: - Loro hanno ragione, noi torto. - E chi lo dice?

translation.en: You can't go about bribing and punching people.
translation.it: Non puoi andare in giro a corrompere e picchiare la gente.

translation.en: Did I punch him? Was a very sluggish jab.
translation.it: Gli ho tirato un pugno? Era solo un colpetto.

translation.en: If I had punched him, he would have been in hospital by now.
translation.it: Se fosse stato un pugno, sarebbe in ospedale.

translation.en: He doesn't mean it.
At times a jab, one good punch will make a man come back to his senses.
translation.it: A volte, un pugno ben assestato fa tornare in senno un uomo.

translation.en: [man] Sarge.
Ada. Relax. I know what I'm doing.
translation.it: Ada, rilassati. So quello che faccio.

translation.en: Don't keep blaming me in their presence.
translation.it: Smettila di incolparmi davanti a loro.

translation.en: Your father knows what I can do and that was why he brought me into this.
translation.it: Tuo padre sa di cosa sono capace per questo mi ha chiamato.

translation.en: Relax. If I blow hot, you blow cold.
translation.it: Rilassati. Se io mi arrabbio, tu stai calma.

translation.en: So, no one has come for them. Nobody. Nobody.
translation.it: - Non è venuto nessuno a prenderli. - Nessuno.

translation.en: -Okay, I'm going for a brief meeting. -Okay, sir.
translation.it: - Ok, ho una breve riunione. - Ok, signore.

translation.en: -I'll be back. -Yes, sir.
Onyinye! Thank God you're here.
translation.it: Onyinye! Grazie a Dio sei qui.

translation.en: I can't believe they would actually lock you up in here, like...
translation.it: Non posso credere che vi abbiano rinchiusi qui, insomma...

translation.en: Do you know who she be? Do you have any idea-- It's, okay, Onyinye, it's fine. I'm okay.
translation.it: - ...sa chi è lei? Ha idea... - Tranquilla, Onyinye. Sto bene.

translation.en: -Just pay the bail money and let's go. -We have a slight problem, Ma.
translation.it: - Paga la cauzione, e andiamo. - C'è un problemino, signora.

translation.en: There's an emergency board meeting going on right now at the office.
translation.it: È in corso una riunione del consiglio, in questo momento.

translation.en: -Why? What for? -I don't know.
translation.it: - Perché? Per cosa? - Non lo so.

translation.en: Approved by who?
Samuel. And Igwe Pascal is in the building.
translation.it: Samuel. E c'è anche Igwe Pascal.

translation.en: Snakes! Scorpions!
Hurry. Pay the money and let's get out of here.
translation.it: Sbrigati. Paga la cauzione e andiamocene.

translation.en: Ada-nna, who's this Igwe Pascal, and what does he want?
translation.it: Ada-nna, chi è questo Igwe Pascal, e cosa vuole?

translation.en: Uncle, I don't know, but whatever it is, I'm sure it's not good.
translation.it: Non lo so, zio, ma qualunque cosa sia, non è niente di buono.

translation.en: Madam, he's not letting me pay the bail.
translation.it: Signora, non mi fa pagare la cauzione.

translation.en: -Why? -I don't know.
What's the problem?
[in Igbo] Madam, my superior is not around.
translation.it: Signora, non c'è il mio superiore.

translation.en: And I can't grant bail if he's not around to sign.
translation.it: E senza la sua firma non posso concedere la cauzione.

translation.en: [in English] So, if your boss suddenly dies,
translation.it: Perciò se il suo capo morisse in un incidente,

translation.en: we will die here because he's not around.
translation.it: in sua assenza moriremmo tutti qui.

translation.en: Well, that's ridiculous. We're ready to go.
translation.it: È ridicolo! Siamo pronti per andarcene.

translation.en: Madam, please be patient. [in Igbo] He'll be back soon.
Come on, release us! Are you crazy?
translation.it: Forza, ci lasci andare! È pazzo?

translation.en: -[in English] Release my madam, Officer. -We're ready to pay for bail.
translation.it: - La lasci andare, agente. - Vogliamo la cauzione.

translation.en: Okay, listen, this is an emergency. We need to leave this place so...
translation.it: Ok, senta, è un'emergenza. Dobbiamo andarcene, perciò...

translation.en: Look, whatever it takes, what do you want?
Just name your price, but we need to get out of here, please.
translation.it: Ci dica il suo prezzo, ma dobbiamo andarcene, per favore.

translation.en: Ada-nna, is that your voice? You...
translation.it: Ada-nna è la tua voce che sento? Tu...

translation.en: bribe?
Uncle, this is different. Okay, talk to me.
translation.it: Zio, ora è diverso. Ok, mi dica.

translation.en: Madam, I understand.
But the problem is...
[in Igbo] If my superior comes in and he doesn't see a man and a woman here,
translation.it: che se il mio superiore arriva e non trova un uomo e una donna,

translation.en: -he will dismiss me. -So your arrest is based on arithmetic.
translation.it: - mi licenzia. - Perciò è questione di aritmetica.

translation.en: One man, one woman. Is that what you're telling me?
translation.it: Un uomo, una donna. Mi sta dicendo questo?

translation.en: [in Igbo] Don't worry. A man and a woman right? He will meet a man and a woman.
translation.it: Non si preoccupi. Un uomo e una donna, no? Troverà un uomo e una donna.

translation.en: [in English] Just open the gate.
My name is...
Igwe Pascal.
It is no more a secret,
that I have an interest in Lionheart.
Unfortunately...
this company...
has lost its vision
and purpose.
Its modus operandi is out of the '40s.
translation.it: Il suo modus operandi è rimasto agli anni 40.

translation.en: Gentlemen and ladies,
I am here to bring the change.
[man] Sarge. [in Igbo] Salute!
[in English] What is he doing here?
And in my father's chair.
translation.it: E sulla sedia di mio padre!

translation.en: Calm down, calm down.
Mr. Igwe Pascal is here because I invited him to come here.
translation.it: Il signor Igwe Pascal è qui perché l'ho invitato io.

translation.en: And also because he... has something very important to share with the board.
translation.it: E anche perché ha qualcosa di importante da condividere col consiglio.

translation.en: Shut that pipe you call mouth!
translation.it: Chiudi quella fogna che chiami bocca!

translation.en: [in Igbo] No other person will betray the company except an albino rat like you.
translation.it: L'unico traditore di questa compagnia sei tu, razza di ratto albino!

translation.en: [in English] The board knows about the default on the loan.
How could you keep this from them? How could you be so irresponsible?
translation.it: Come avete potuto tenerlo segreto? Come potete essere così irresponsabili?

translation.en: I... can explain.
It's just a minor setback which we have under control.
translation.it: Non è che un piccolo intoppo, - ed è sotto controllo. - Per fortuna...

translation.en: Unfortunately,
translation.it: - ed è sotto controllo. - Per fortuna...

translation.en: Daniel has come to judgment in the person of Mr. Pascal Igwe.
translation.it: ...ci si è presentata una soluzione, ed è il signor Pascal Igwe.

translation.en: Now Mr. Pascal Igwe has drawn out a very generous proposal,
translation.it: Il signor Pascal Igwe ha per noi una proposta molto interessante.

translation.en: to buy out Lionheart and incorporate it into IG Motors.
translation.it: Vuole comprare la Lionheart e incorporarla nella IG Motors.

translation.en: A three billion Naira buy-out.
I, for one would take this course of action
translation.it: Io personalmente sarei portato ad accettare...

translation.en: very, very quickly given the limited time we have left.
translation.it: ...e molto in fretta, dato che ci resta poco tempo.

translation.en: And, let's not forget the recent failures of the Obiagus.
translation.it: E non dimentichiamo i recenti fallimenti degli Obiagu.

translation.en: -I beg your pardon! -But!
I cannot honestly say that I can... trust the Obiagus' ability to...
translation.it: ...non posso dire in tutta onestà di potermi fidare degli Obiagu...

translation.en: provide the kind of leadership this company needs.
translation.it: ...per dirigere questa compagnia come c'è bisogno.

translation.en: I was calling you a scorpion, you're worse than a scorpion.
translation.it: Ti ho definito uno scorpione, ma sei molto peggio.

translation.en: You're a snake. You're a vampire.
Gentlemen, there is no need for name-calling.
translation.it: Signori, non c'è bisogno di ricorrere agli insulti.

translation.en: I am a busy businessman.
I haven't got time for this.
The bank has given you two weeks.
translation.it: La banca vi ha concesso due settimane.

translation.en: I give you ten days to make up your mind.
translation.it: Io vi concedo dieci giorni per decidere.

translation.en: Good day, gentlemen. [Samuel] I'll see you off as well.
No, leave him. That's how traitors do.
translation.it: Lascialo andare! È così che fanno i traditori.

translation.en: Sir, Madam.
Please do not listen to this man.
Look, my father built this company on the core values of courage and trust,
translation.it: Sentite, mio padre ha fondato questa compagnia sul coraggio e sulla fiducia,

translation.en: and I implore you right now to trust me. My uncle and I have this under control.
translation.it: e vi prego di fidarvi di me. Io e mio zio abbiamo tutto sotto controllo.

translation.en: You ask us to trust you.
translation.it: Vuole che ci fidiamo di lei.

translation.en: Your family has been less than forthcoming
translation.it: La sua famiglia è stata tutto tranne che collaborativa

translation.en: -with the board. -Exactly.
Look, finding out about a loan from an outsider is not encouraging.
translation.it: Senta, scoprire di questo prestito da un esterno non è incoraggiante.

translation.en: It's not.
-We respect your father. -That's right.
But... for the sake of the future of this company,
translation.it: Ma... per il bene di questa compagnia...

translation.en: We have no choice but to consider Mr. Pascal's offer.
translation.it: ...non abbiamo scelta se non considerare l'offerta del signor Pascal.

translation.en: Who said you don't have a choice?
translation.it: Chi ha detto che non avete scelta?

translation.en: We have a choice. Look... And we have just one choice,
translation.it: Certo che ce l'abbiamo. Sentite. L'unica scelta...

translation.en: -reject his proposal. -[man] No.
-Refuse his offer. -No!
Please, look, if this company falls into the hands of Igwe Pascal,
translation.it: Per favore, se questa compagnia finisce nelle mani di Igwe Pascal...

translation.en: I can assure you it will be a shadow of itself.
translation.it: ...vi assicuro che diventerà l'ombra di se stessa.

translation.en: Lionheart will not be the company as you know it today.
translation.it: La Lionheart non sarà più la compagnia che conoscete ora.

translation.en: Yes.
So, please give us a chance to make things right, please.
translation.it: Perciò dateci la possibilità di sistemare la situazione. Per favore.

translation.en: [Godswill] Please.
Igwe gave you ten days, Igwe Pascal.
translation.it: Igwe vi ha dato dieci giorni. Igwe Pascal.

translation.en: -Take ten days. -[man 1] Yes.
-Ten days is okay. -That's okay.
-No, Chief, even ten days will-- -We'll take it.
-Ten days? -[man 2] I think is rather impromptu--
translation.it: - Dieci giorni? - Mi sembra piuttosto improvvisato,

translation.en: And, sorry, but in the foreseeable future, gentlemen...
translation.it: e scusate, ma nell'immediato futuro, signori...

translation.en: So...
You don't have to be moody at all. You have...
You have done the best any woman, any man can do.
translation.it: Hai fatto il meglio che una donna, o anche un uomo potesse fare.

translation.en: In fact, what you need now is rest.
Rest? Uncle, this is not the time to rest.
translation.it: Riposare? Zio, non è il momento.

translation.en: -Why? -Igwe Pascal is a ruthless business man.
translation.it: - Perché? - Igwe Pascal è un uomo senza scrupoli.

translation.en: He doesn't care about Lionheart, or its people, just its assets.
translation.it: Non gli importa della Lionheart o di chi ci lavora, solo dei suoi beni.

translation.en: If that man becomes the owner of this company,
translation.it: Se quell'uomo ne diventa il proprietario,

translation.en: many people will lose their jobs, I can assure you.
translation.it: molta gente perderà il lavoro, te l'assicuro.

translation.en: [in Igbo] God Forbid!
[in English] He cannot be. That's number one.
-What would the families begin to do? -Exactly.
You know you were telling me about your plans.
translation.it: Prima mi stavi parlando dei tuoi piani.

translation.en: I want to know all your plans, now.
I assume that this one is plan one.
translation.it: Presumo che questo sia il primo.

translation.en: Well, I was hoping that the BRT contract would go through.
translation.it: Beh, speravo che ci saremmo aggiudicati il contratto BRT.

translation.en: Actually I'm very positive it--
[in Igbo] Ada-nna, the BRT is like a a corporate job. It can't be relied on.
translation.it: Ada-nna, il BRT è come un lavoro in azienda. Non ci si può contare.

translation.en: [in English] It can go away at any time.
Just like marriages of the past...
[in Igbo] where the woman is idle and eats up the wealth of the man.
translation.it: ...in cui la donna è pigra e consuma tutte le ricchezze del marito.

translation.en: Unlike what is obtainable now.
[in English] Anyway, you might not understand what I'm saying.
translation.it: Comunque potresti non capire di cosa parlo.

translation.en: No, I understand fully, uncle.
translation.it: - Non ancora, ma... - No, capisco perfettamente, zio.

translation.en: That's why I work hard for my money. I'm not here to depend on any man to--
translation.it: Perciò mi guadagno i miei soldi. Non voglio dipendere da un uomo.

translation.en: Don't get angry, I didn't mean it that way.
translation.it: - Non arrabbiarti, non intendevo... - Non mi arrabbio,

translation.en: I'm not getting angry but I've dated men that...
translation.it: - Non arrabbiarti, non intendevo... - Non mi arrabbio, ma sono uscita con uomini che...

translation.en: You've dated men that did what? [in Igbo] Did anyone hurt you?
translation.it: Che cosa? Ti hanno fatto del male?

translation.en: [in English] Talk to me, I'm your uncle.
-You have dated men that-- -No, thanks, uncle. But…
translation.it: - Sei uscita con uomini che... - No, grazie, zio. Ma...

translation.en: I think I know a man we can rely on.
translation.it: ...credo di conoscere un uomo di cui mi fido.

translation.en: Are you sure?
Arinze!
Who is Arinze?
[Adaeze in English] Excuse me.
Excuse me. Sorry, where's Arinze?
Thank you.
Uncle?
You know what, you can just wait here. I'll be back.
translation.it: Sai una cosa? Aspettami qui. Torno subito.

translation.en: -No, let me go with you. -No, it's fine.
translation.it: - No, vengo con te. - No, davvero,

translation.en: -He's alright. It will only take a minute. -Really?
translation.it: - è uno a posto. Ci vorrà un minuto. - Davvero?

translation.en: -Yes. -Okay. Are you sure you'll be safe?
translation.it: - Sì. - Ok. Sicura che vada bene?

translation.en: Hello, how are you? I'm alright.
What a pleasant surprise.
-Hi. -Look at you.
I and my partner, we can supply you with all the vehicles you need.
translation.it: Io e il mio partner possiamo fornirti tutti i veicoli che ti servono.

translation.en: This is our inventory. You can go through it.
translation.it: Questo è il nostro inventario. Puoi esaminarlo.

translation.en: All the model numbers are there.
translation.it: Ci sono tutti i numeri dei modelli.

translation.en: We can supply to you
only if you can pay that 30% deposit.
translation.it: ...solo se puoi pagare quel deposito del 30%.

translation.en: -Well, how is your dad? -Yeah...
-Hope he's recovering? -Oh, he's much better. Thank you.
translation.it: - Si sta riprendendo? - Sta molto meglio. Grazie.

translation.en: Okay, I won't, uh, take much of your time so you can get back to your stuff.
translation.it: - Grazie a Dio. - Ok, non voglio... ...farti perdere tempo, così puoi tornare alle tue cose.

translation.en: Lionheart is in trouble.
Yeah.
And I need a loan.
[man 1 in Igbo] Please can you tell him to hurry up. I want to buy myself a new car.
translation.it: Per favore digli di sbrigarsi. Voglio comprarmi un'auto nuova.

translation.en: He should pay up fast.
[man 2] I'm not playing here. I'm a hustler.
translation.it: Non sto giocando. Ho da fare.

translation.en: [in English] What did he say?
Oh, he was saying that...
you have a sense of business, he likes your personality.
translation.it: ...hai fiuto per gli affari. Gli piace la tua personalità.

translation.en: -Ah, thank you, sir. -That you have an eye for good business.
translation.it: - Ah, grazie. - Hai occhio per gli affari.

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate it.
We are in debt of 950 million.
Yeah. I'm hoping to raise at least a third of it,
translation.it: Già. Spero di raccogliere almeno 1/3 della cifra,

translation.en: and if I'm able to get that, then-- I will give you 500.
translation.it: - e se ci riesco, allora... - Te ne do 500.

translation.en: What?
You heard me right.
I will give you 500.
You have 500 million just lying about Arinze, really?
translation.it: Hai davvero 500 milioni in giro per casa, Arinze?

translation.en: Not really, but I can always work things out.
Are you serious?
Of course, I'm very serious.
30% is a little over 100 million.
translation.it: Il 30% è poco più di 100 milioni.

translation.en: Sounds too good to be true. I don't know.
translation.it: Sembra troppo bello per essere vero. Non sono convinto.

translation.en: [man 2] It's not like that, I'm just doing just a giveaway,
translation.it: Non è così, ti sto facendo un'offerta vantaggiosa

translation.en: because this is my first business with you.
translation.it: perché è la prima volta che lavoriamo insieme.

translation.en: [in Igbo] You need to be mindful of the money so we know our share.
translation.it: Devi stare attento ai soldi, così sappiamo qual è la nostra parte.

translation.en: Remember Arinze has a cut.
translation.it: Ricorda che una parte è di Arinze.

translation.en: [man 1] I'm aware. If I had known, I would have added more money.
translation.it: Lo so. A saperlo, avrei chiesto più soldi.

translation.en: [in English] Because he's a nice man. That's why I'm giving it to him.
translation.it: Perché è un tipo simpatico. Ecco perché gli faccio quest'offerta.

translation.en: That's giving a good price. You understand?
[in Igbo] Once he pays...
Arinze! My God. Thank you!
Thank you. I promise you I will pay back every penny.
translation.it: Grazie. Ti prometto che ti restituirò l'intera somma.

translation.en: -There is this contract that we're-- -Ada.
Ada, be cool. Enough of all this business talk.
translation.it: Ada, stai tranquilla. Basta parlare di affari.

translation.en: [in Igbo] What would you like to drink?
[in English] No, I have to go back to the office, I'm on duty so--
translation.it: No, devo tornare in ufficio. Devo lavorare, e...

translation.en: Like, seriously, you go to work like this.
translation.it: Sul serio, vai a lavorare così.

translation.en: This is, this is a long story. Don't even ask.
translation.it: È una storia lunga. Non chiedere.

translation.en: Now you look so tense.
Arinze I'm not, I'm not tense. I'm...
You are tense.
I'm not tense.
I don't know you, but if you like your life, you leave now.
translation.it: Non ti conosco, ma se tieni alla tua vita, va' via subito.

translation.en: [man 3] I don't... What are you talking about?
These people are not what you think they are.
translation.it: Questa gente non è chi credi che sia.

translation.en: They are swind-- What do you call "shit" at your place?
translation.it: Sono dei truffatori... come si dice "merda" da te?

translation.en: These are two pieces of kashi. Very bad ones.
translation.it: Sono due pezzi di kashi. Tremendi.

translation.en: The are swindlers. They are here to... I was here, listening to them in Igbo.
translation.it: Sono truffatori. Vogliono... io ero qui, li sentivo parlare in Igbo.

translation.en: You don't understand Igbo. So they are playing you in Igbo.
translation.it: Tu non capisci l'Igbo. Ti stanno ingannando.

translation.en: -You know what? -Hm?
I think I have something to get you more relaxed.
translation.it: Credo di avere qualcosa per aiutarti a rilassarti.

translation.en: Like, like what?
Wait. I'm coming.
-Don't listen to this man. -Sorry.
-You can see this man is drunk. -No, no.
-Let's do... We can do this business. -No.
Save your life. Save your money.
[man 2] Mr. Hamza. Please, just hold on.
-We can do this business. -No, no.
Look at what you are doing, all this stupid business.
translation.it: Guardate cosa state combinando, con questi stupidi affari.

translation.en: [in Igbo] Tarnishing the image of the Igbo people.
Why don't you go to the secretariat and look for a job?
translation.it: Perché non vi cercate un lavoro?

translation.en: Change your clothes and go into farming.
Agriculture is thriving right now.
[in English] Go and farm. You are painting us black. Aren't you ashamed?
translation.it: Andate a coltivare. Ci umiliate. Non vi vergognate?

translation.en: [in Igbo] No, no. no.
[man 2 in Igbo] Where are you going?
[Godswill] Where are you going? Have you become a security man?
translation.it: Sei diventato un addetto alla sicurezza? Scappi via dopo averci rovinato l'affare?

translation.en: [Man 1] You want to run away after disrupting our deal?
translation.it: Scappi via dopo averci rovinato l'affare?

translation.en: Let me tell you...
We are all Igbo people.
So, Ada...
[Man 2] You will have to pay us 30% of the money.
translation.it: Dovrai pagarci tu il 30% di quei soldi.

translation.en: Really?
Yes. You hit him well.
-[in English] Ada-nna. -Uncle, we need to go.
Yeah, good idea.
[in Igbo] Remain on the ground. Stupid man.
[Adaeze] Director.
Hello, sir, good afternoon.
I was just coming to see you. Did you get my e-mails?
translation.it: Stavo proprio venendo da lei. Ha ricevuto le mie e-mail?

translation.en: -Yes, yes I did. -Okay.
But unfortunately, there's little I can do right now.
translation.it: Ma purtroppo c'è poco che io possa fare.

translation.en: The EFCC is investigating us as we speak.
translation.it: La EFCC ha aperto un'indagine su di noi.

translation.en: The Perm Sec has been placed on compulsory leave,
translation.it: Il Segretario è stato messo in congedo obbligatorio.

translation.en: and between you and me, he's not coming back.
translation.it: E detto tra noi... non tornerà.

translation.en: So, as it stands now,
translation.it: Perciò, per come stanno ora le cose...

translation.en: I don't have idea of the fate of the BRT project.
translation.it: ...non ho idea di quale sarà il futuro del progetto BRT.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
[in Igbo] It's only God that can save us from this mess.
translation.it: Solo Dio può salvarci da questo disastro.

translation.en: [in English] Thank you.
Madam, I'm very sorry.
My apologies to your father.
translation.it: Porga le mie scuse a suo padre.

translation.en: This is the change we all believe in.
translation.it: È un cambiamento in cui crediamo tutti.

translation.en: Good morning, Ma.
[in Igbo] Hello. Onyinye?
Is anything wrong?
She didn't come to work?
[in English] Leave me alone.
I'm not hungry.
[Abigail] My friend, I'm coming in.
Mummy?
Yes, dear.
[in Igbo] I heard you didn't go to work.
translation.it: So che non sei andata in ufficio.

translation.en: [Adaeze in English] I'm not feeling well.
You're not feeling well.
[in Igbo] Onyinye called me.
[in English] I'm so tired, mummy.
I'm exhausted.
What is really the problem?
I can't get an extension on the loans.
translation.it: Non riesco a ottenere un'estensione dei prestiti.

translation.en: BRT contract is not forthcoming.
translation.it: E il contratto BRT è saltato.

translation.en: And if this... Igwe Pascal man gets a hold of our company,
translation.it: E se questo Igwe Pascal mette le mani sulla nostra compagnia,

translation.en: everyone will lose their jobs.
And they are depending on me, and I feel like I'm failing.
translation.it: E dipendono da me, e sento che sto fallendo.

translation.en: You have not started and you feel like such a failure?
translation.it: Non hai ancora iniziato, e ti senti un fallimento?

translation.en: Do you know what your father put into setting up this company?
translation.it: Sai quanto ci ha messo tuo padre a metter su questa compagnia?

translation.en: The challenges, the mistakes, the failures he had to face?
translation.it: Le sfide, gli errori, i fallimenti che ha dovuto affrontare?

translation.en: And yet he made it.
What is it they say?
It's not over till it's over.
translation.it: Non è finita finché non è finita.

translation.en: Yes but, mummy, I'm running out of ideas. I don't know what to do.
translation.it: Sì, ma mamma, sto esaurendo le idee. Non so cosa fare.

translation.en: God never gives you a burden he has not equipped you to carry.
translation.it: Dio non ti da' mai un peso che non sei in grado di sopportare.

translation.en: What should I do?
What can I do?
You have your father's business brains. You're a businesswoman.
translation.it: Hai il cervello di tuo padre per gli affari. Sei una donna d'affari.

translation.en: Do away with the sentiments and the emotions.
translation.it: Lascia stare i sentimenti e le emozioni.

translation.en: And get the job done. You have it in you.
translation.it: E fa' ciò che devi. Ne hai la forza, dentro di te.

translation.en: Dig deep and get it.
You've always been able to do anything you put your mind to.
translation.it: Sei sempre stata in grado di fare tutto ciò che volevi.

translation.en: You can do this.
Thank you, mummy.
You can do this, you're gonna be alright.
Listen, get dressed, come to the house
and let's have a nice meal.
Your auntie Chioma is around and she's been asking for you.
translation.it: È arrivata tua zia Chioma, e chiede di te.

translation.en: -She is? -Yeah.
She came to see her husband. You know those two,
translation.it: È venuta a trovare il marito. Conosci quei due,

translation.en: they never stay away from each other for too long.
translation.it: non stanno mai lontani troppo a lungo.

translation.en: Come on, get dressed.
-Okay, I'll see you there. -Alright.
translation.it: - Ok, ci vediamo lì. - Va bene.

translation.en: Good evening.
-Oh, Ada-nna. -Aunty.
[in Igbo] Ada... You are looking beautiful.
What?
She looks tiny. Are you people feeding her?
translation.it: È minuscola. Le date da mangiare?

translation.en: Can't you see food everywhere? You ask if she is being fed.
translation.it: Non vedi che c'è cibo ovunque? Figurati se non la nutriamo.

translation.en: Don't allow your father and uncle to tear you apart. Take it easy.
translation.it: Non permettere a tuo padre e tuo zio di farti stancare troppo. Riposati.

translation.en: Please don't blame anybody. She goes to the gym.
translation.it: Non dare la colpa a noi, va in palestra.

translation.en: Gym?
Fashion. That's the trend these days.
translation.it: Fashion. È la moda di adesso.

translation.en: I heard the first daughter of John Bosco
translation.it: Ho sentito che la figlia maggiore di John Bosco...

translation.en: is getting married next month.
John Bosco looked at his son-in-law and felt he looked really skinny.
translation.it: John Bosco ha guardato suo genero, e gli è parso molto magro.

translation.en: He then asked him,
"Can you take care of my daughter looking this way?"
translation.it: "Puoi prenderti cura di mia figlia, in questo stato?"

translation.en: He replied,
"My in-law, it is all in God's hands."
translation.it: "Suocero mio, è tutto nelle mani di Dio."

translation.en: John Bosco replied, "I have heard you."
Let me tell you the truth…
You don't understand what the son-in-law meant...
translation.it: Non capisci cosa voleva dire suo genero.

translation.en: The God he was referring to, was John Bosco.
translation.it: Il Dio di cui parlava è John Bosco.

translation.en: He will call him God-John Bosco if you let him.
translation.it: Lo chiamerà Dio John Bosco, potendo.

translation.en: It's not a lie.
That's young men of today.
Saying it is in the hands of God implies it is in the hands of John Bosco.
translation.it: Le mani di Dio sono quelle di John Bosco.

translation.en: John Bosco is God. Let me tell you, that's what we suffer nowadays.
translation.it: - John Bosco è Dio. - Lascia che te lo dica...

translation.en: When a young man wants to marry...
he'll first ask around if the parents are wealthy.
translation.it: Quando un giovane uomo vuole sposarsi... ...prima chiederà se i genitori sono ricchi.

translation.en: If both the parents are not wealthy, he disappears.
translation.it: Se nessuno dei due genitori è ricco... - ...sparisce. - Scomparso.

translation.en: He's gone.
My sister, it is just tiring. It's too much.
translation.it: Sorella mia, è stancante. È troppo.

translation.en: That's how a child will carry on something too heavy to handle.
translation.it: È così che uno si ritrova con un peso troppo grande.

translation.en: My dear, if such a man comes for you... run!
translation.it: Mia cara, se un uomo così ti vuole... scappa!

translation.en: Make sure your feet hit your ears as you run.
translation.it: Assicurati che i piedi ti colpiscano le orecchie, mentre scappi.

translation.en: [Godswill] It is not that you see a man and start running...
translation.it: Non devi fuggire appena vedi un uomo...

translation.en: because you might be in this sort of race and run past your future husband...
translation.it: ...perché correndo potresti perderti il tuo futuro marito...

translation.en: then, we won't get to drink on your wedding day.
translation.it: ...e noi non berremo al tuo matrimonio.

translation.en: How it is done is that, first, you study the man...
translation.it: Si facosì: prima devi studiare quell'uomo.

translation.en: if he is a reasonable person, you accept him.
translation.it: Si facosì: prima devi studiare quell'uomo. Se è una persona ragionevole, lo accetti.

translation.en: But if it's any of those men that sag their trousers to their knees...
translation.it: Ma se è uno di quegli uomini coi pantaloni ad altezza ginocchia...

translation.en: Run!
Because these children feel like they are of marriageable age...
translation.it: Perché questi giovani si reputano in età da matrimonio.

translation.en: "If a child tried to tie a wrapper before maturity, when the wind comes--
translation.it: "Se un bimbo si annoda il caftano un caftano prima del tempo..."

translation.en: [Abigail] It will blow him away along with the wrapper."
translation.it: "Qquando arriva il vento, voleranno via sia lui che il caftano."

translation.en: Obiora, you have heard what they said. What do you want to do with your life?
translation.it: Obiora, hai sentito cos'hanno detto. Che intendi fare della tua vita?

translation.en: What sort of question is that?
translation.it: - Che domanda è? - Ti ha fatto una domanda.

translation.en: So the music I am into isn't beneficial to my life?
translation.it: Perciò la mia vita non beneficia della musica che mi piace?

translation.en: I'm a musician. You've always known this is what I do.
translation.it: Sono un musicista. Sai che è questo ciò che faccio.

translation.en: Music is your choice of profession?
translation.it: La musica è la tua professione?

translation.en: You know you are Igbo?
Essentially, every day you move around with an instrument
translation.it: Essenzialmente, ogni giorno vai in giro con uno strumento,

translation.en: all in the name of music?
[Obiora] Was Osadebe not an Igbo man?
Is it not his music you always play in this house?
translation.it: Non ascolti sempre la sua musica?

translation.en: Chief, he got you there!
[Ernest] You win.
You win, before I choke.
translation.it: Hai vinto, prima che io soffochi.

translation.en: At least I have not gone to jail like Ada and Uncle Goddy.
translation.it: Almeno non sono finito in prigione come Ada e zio Goddy.

translation.en: Leave me out of it.
you cannot go to jail.
translation.it: Obiora, non puoi andare in prigione.

translation.en: [Godswill] You look like a new baby's bath water.
translation.it: Sembri l'acqua del bagnetto di un neonato.

translation.en: If you go to jail, will you come out alive?
translation.it: Se vai in prigione, come ne esci vivo?

translation.en: See your beard looking like that of Nebuchadnezzar.
translation.it: La tua barba sembra quella di Nebuchadnezzar.

translation.en: It will be the first thing they shave with a bottle.
translation.it: Te la raseranno subito con una bottiglia.

translation.en: [Obiora] At least I look like my father with the beard.
translation.it: Almeno non sembro mio padre con la barba.

translation.en: You know I support you, but I'm just telling you the truth.
translation.it: Sai che sto dalla tua parte, ma ti sto dicendo la verità.

translation.en: Are you saying I don't work hard?
translation.it: Vuoi dire che non lavoro duramente?

translation.en: Please, let's eat, before I choke on pepper.
translation.it: Per favore, mangiamo, prima che mi strozzi col pepe.

translation.en: Hi daddy.
[in Igbo] Ada, how are you?
[in English] I'm good.
How are you?
Well, I am grateful to God for my life.
translation.it: Beh, sono grato a Dio per la mia vita.

translation.en: But you see there comes a time in the life of a man
translation.it: Ma viene un momento nella vita di un uomo

translation.en: when he decides to take stock.
translation.it: in cui decide di fare il punto.

translation.en: I've come to realize that most men invest all their time
translation.it: Ho realizzato che la maggior parte degli uomini investe il proprio tempo...

translation.en: in matters of transient value,
at the expense of what they should cherish, what they should value,
translation.it: ...invece che nelle cose che dovrrebbe appezzare, stimare...

translation.en: like love, life,
family.
I waited eight years for you to be born.
translation.it: Ho aspettato otto anni prima che tu nascessi.

translation.en: Those were years of trepidation.
And you came and you became a source of pride and joy to me.
translation.it: Poi sei arrivata, e sei stata fonte di orgoglio e gioia per me.

translation.en: I have watched you grow,
and I'm so confident in your ability.
translation.it: E ho piena fiducia nelle tue capacità.

translation.en: The biggest legacy...
I would leave for posterity...
is you.
My daughter.
I'm not thinking about death, but...
Marie Connely said, "In the midst of life we are in death,"
translation.it: ...Marie Connely disse: "Nel mezzo della vita, ci troviamo nella morte",

translation.en: so occasionally when we talk about life, there's always death hovering around.
translation.it: perciò mentre parliamo della vita c'è sempre la morte intorno a noi.

translation.en: You are the pendulum of my life.
translation.it: Tu sei il pendolo della mia vita.

translation.en: If you stop swinging,
then I am done.
I'm proud of you. You mean so much to me. Come on. Come on.
translation.it: Sono fiero di te. Sei tutto per me. Vieni qui.

translation.en: Thank you, daddy.
I'm proud of you, I'm proud of you.
I'm proud of you. Yeah. Sit down.
translation.it: Sono fiero di te. Sì, siediti.

translation.en: [in Igbo] Please help me.
Madam, if you want to go straight to Lagos, get into the bus.
translation.it: Signora, se vuole andare direttamente a Lagos, salga sul pullman.

translation.en: But if you intend on stopping in Sagamu, then go to Lionheart.
translation.it: M se vuole fermarsi a Sagamu, prenda il Lionheart.

translation.en: This bus is going straight to Lagos. We are not stopping over at Sagamu.
translation.it: Questo pullman va diretto a Lagos. Non ci fermiamo a Sagamu.

translation.en: Why will you tell me to go to Lionheart and pay 6,000 Naira
translation.it: Perché vuole che prenda il Lionheart spendendo 6000 Naira,

translation.en: when my destination is Sagamu? Am I going to Lagos?
translation.it: quando voglio andare a Sagamu? Vado a Lagos?

translation.en: Madam.
Since you knew you were going to Sagamu, you should have come here on time.
translation.it: Per andare a Sagamu, sarebbe dovuta arrivare in orario.

translation.en: The vehicles that travel to Sagamu left the park already.
translation.it: I veicoli diretti a Sagamu sono già partiti.

translation.en: If you want to go to Lagos, then get into the bus. If not, please leave.
translation.it: Se vuole andare a Lagos, salga. Altrimenti se ne vada, per favore.

translation.en: This is the Peace Express to Lagos. We don't make multiple stops.
translation.it: Questo è il Peace Express per Lagos. Non facciamo più fermate.

translation.en: -[in English] Morning, morning. -Morning, Ma.
Not now. Get the GM.
I want all available drivers assembled in the meeting hall. Now.
translation.it: Voglio tutti gli autisti disponibili in sala riunioni, ora.

translation.en: -Okay. -Morning.
[man 1 in Igbo] They're faster.
We can't navigate those narrow roads.
translation.it: Le strade sono troppo strette per noi.

translation.en: [man 2] Ask the small bus drivers, they know!
translation.it: Chieda agli autisti dei pullman più piccoli!

translation.en: The small buses are always at full capacity.
translation.it: I pullman più piccoli sono sempre pieni.

translation.en: [man 3] Our fares are too expensive.
translation.it: Le nostre tariffe sono troppo elevate.

translation.en: How much is it?
Our big buses cannot compete.
translation.it: I nostri grossi pullman non possono competere.

translation.en: Not on speed, routes, rates... nothing!
Our passengers are becoming impatient.
translation.it: I nostri passeggeri stanno diventando impazienti.

translation.en: [man 4] The small bus companies are killing us right now.
translation.it: Le compagnie più piccole ci stanno uccidendo.

translation.en: [man 5] To reduce our rates, we should invest in small buses.
translation.it: Per abbassare i prezzi dobbiamo investire in pullman più piccoli. Ecco cosa serve.

translation.en: [Godswill in English] Ada-nna.
You look moody. Why?
Let's just say...
I now understand what you've been talking about all this while.
Well, I'm happy you eventually realize it.
The major thing is to understand at your own time. It's good.
translation.it: La cosa importante è capirlo coi propri tempi. È una bella cosa.

translation.en: Where we going to get small buses from?
translation.it: Dove prenderemo i pullman più piccoli?

translation.en: We can't afford to buy any more buses at this time.
translation.it: Non possiamo permetterci di comprarne altri.

translation.en: Yes, we can't afford to buy it, but where...
we can achieve it.
You know.
I talked to you once.
They have been looking for a way to enter the East.
translation.it: Cercano un modo per espandersi a est.

translation.en: Maybe if we push for the merger with them, it's solved.
translation.it: Forse tramite una fusione risolveremo il problema.

translation.en: Maikano Motors is a very big transport company, uncle.
translation.it: La Maikano Motors è una compagnia di trasporti molto grande.

translation.en: I know.
I don't know if they'll go with the idea of a merger.
translation.it: Non so se gradiranno l'idea di una fusione.

translation.en: Why not?
Listen, this is one thing that they have been looking for,
translation.it: Ascolta, è ciò che stanno cercando di fare

translation.en: for a very long time, to enter the East.
translation.it: da parecchio tempo, espandersi a est.

translation.en: Preferably with a reputable and big transport company,
translation.it: Preferibilmente con una compagnia di trasporti grande e rispettabile.

translation.en: which we are.
So...
They find what they're looking for,
and they have the small buses we are looking for, so...
translation.it: e noi avremo i pullman più piccoli che ci servono, perciò...

translation.en: [in Igbo] "Since the food is delicious, the soup looks good,
translation.it: ..."Se il cibo è delizioso e la zuppa sembra buona,

translation.en: what stops the visitor from eating?"
I think it's worth a try.
Good.
I'll get them to set up a meeting and then we'll-- No, no, no, no...
-Don't be so fast, Ada. -What?
translation.it: - Non così in fretta, Ada. - Che c'è?

translation.en: [in Igbo] "You need to take out the log of wood from the top
before the one below."
[in English] If you understand my gist.
-No, no, no! -Odogwu--
Nobody will take my company away from me. Nobody! No.
translation.it: Nessuno mi toglierà la mia compagnia, nessuno! No!

translation.en: It is a merger. Nobody's taking your company away from you.
translation.it: È una fusione! Nessuno ti porterà via la compagnia.

translation.en: What is the difference between a merger, and what Igwe Pascal propose? Tell me.
translation.it: Che differenza c'è tra una fusione e la proposta di Igwe Pascal?

translation.en: Well, Igwe Pascal wants to buy us out.
And we both know that will be the end of Lionheart if he did.
translation.it: E sappiamo entrambi che sarebbe la fine della Lionheart.

translation.en: But with a merger with Maikano we can still, have some sort of control over our destiny.
translation.it: Ma tramite una fusione con la Maikano avremo il controllo sul nostro destino.

translation.en: [in Igbo] Chief, listen to what your daughter is saying.
translation.it: Capo, ascolta ciò che ti dice tua figlia.

translation.en: [in English] Listen to her. We have run out of options completely.
They will not grant us extension on this loan.
And no bankers want to give us any other loan as it stands now.
translation.it: E nessuna banca ce ne darà un altro, in queste condizioni.

translation.en: So it's either Maikano, or Igwe Pascal, which we don't want.
translation.it: Perciò o la Makano o Igwe Pascal, che è ciò che non vogliamo.

translation.en: And, they are Hausa?
Daddy, come on, this is business.
translation.it: Dai papà, si tratta di affari.

translation.en: Alright.
What if Maikano does not accept our terms? You tell me.
translation.it: E se la Maikano non accetta le nostre condizioni?

translation.en: Oh, daddy, leave that to me.
Leave that to us.
[in Igbo] "Throw the bone to us dogs and leave the fight to us and the spirits."
translation.it: "Lancia l'osso a noi cani, e lascia che la lotta sia tra noi e gli spiriti."

translation.en: [in English] We can do it. You have said it yourself.
translation.it: Possiamo farcela. L'hai detto tu stesso.

translation.en: ...such as for...
We request...
They, to apply the application... Sorry to interrupt you.
You remember me?
The house with the pool with all the women.
translation.it: La casa con la piscina e tutte quelle donne.

translation.en: -House with the pool... -You saved me from being duped
translation.it: - La casa con la piscina... - Mi ha salvato dalla truffa

translation.en: by those fraudsters.
-How are you? -I'm very well.
It's a small world.
Hey, you know, I never got a chance to thank you the other day.
translation.it: Non ho avuto l'occasione di ringraziarla, l'altro giorno.

translation.en: -Yes. -I'm glad I have the opportunity
-to express my gratitude now. -No, you don't need
translation.it: - esprimere la mia gratitudine. - No, non deve

translation.en: to worry yourself. Just do good to any human being you see anywhere
translation.it: preoccuparsi. Sia buono con gli esseri umani che incontra,

translation.en: because you never know what tomorrow will turn out to be.
translation.it: perché non si sa mai come sarà il domani.

translation.en: -You're right. Thank you very much. -It turned out well. -Thank you. -[Adaeze clears throat]
translation.it: - Ha ragione. Grazie mille. - È andata bene. Grazie.

translation.en: Sorry. Meet my niece. Adaeze.
translation.it: Scusa. Le presento mia nipote, Adaeze.

translation.en: -It's a pleasure. -Pleased to meet you.
So where are you both headed?
We are... actually, we're going to Kano.
Oh wow. I hope all is well.
translation.it: Oh, wow. Spero vada tutto bene.

translation.en: All is well. We want to meet...
one business mogul in Kano.
You know, Alhaji Maikano.
Want to see if we can strike a deal with him.
translation.it: Vorremmo stringere un accordo con lui.

translation.en: Have you met him before?
No, no, no, no. But I intend to see him when I get to Kano.
translation.it: No, ma intendo incontrarlo quando arrivo a Kano.

translation.en: -Wow. -Yes.
Well, let me introduce myself. My name is Hamza Maikano.
translation.it: Beh, lasciate che mi presenti. Mi chiamo Hamza Maikano.

translation.en: -Hamza who? -Yes.
The man over there is my father. Alhaji Danladi Maikano.
translation.it: Quell'uomo laggiù è mio padre. Alhaji Danladi Maikano.

translation.en: Maikano of Maikano Transport? Yes.
-What? -We are actually on our way to Kano.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Stiamo giusto andando a Kano.

translation.en: So you can come with us. I will make an introduction.
translation.it: Potete venire con noi. Ve lo presento.

translation.en: -And I can help you with your bags. -Yes, yes.
translation.it: - E posso aiutarvi con le valigie. - Sì.

translation.en: Not now, uncle, wait. Ada-nna.
You will discuss with this man alone. I will stay on the flank.
translation.it: Parlerai tu con quest'uomo, da sola. Io resterò in disparte.

translation.en: [in Igbo] But uncle, we are meant to be in this together.
I know we are in this together.
[in English] But look, you are a leader. He sees a leader.
translation.it: Ma tu sei una leader. Lui vede un leader.

translation.en: Leadership is not easy.
translation.it: Non è facile essere un leader.

translation.en: Talk with him one on one.
The head of one organization
versus the head of the other organization.
[in Igbo] Go, don't be scared. I am around.
translation.it: Vai, non avere paura. Io sarò qui intorno.

translation.en: Don't be scared.
-You're welcome. -Yeah, thank you.
Do have a seat, Miss Obiagu.
-Thank you, sir. -Yeah.
So, how is your father?
I've not met him, but he has quite a reputation.
translation.it: Non lo conosco, ma la sua reputazione lo precede.

translation.en: Well, he's doing very well. Thank you for asking.
translation.it: Beh, sta molto bene. Grazie di averlo chiesto.

translation.en: So what can I do for you?
translation.it: Allora, cosa posso fare per lei?

translation.en: Well, sir, I'm aware you are trying to enter the Eastern region.
translation.it: Beh, signore, so che lei sta cercando di espandersi nella regione orientale.

translation.en: Well, I'm here to let you know
Lionheart Transport is willing to make your transition a smooth one.
translation.it: che i Trasporti Lionheart vogliono facilitarle la transizione.

translation.en: Really?
Yes, we have a fleet of 200 buses
translation.it: Sì, abbiamo un parco veicoli di 200 pullman,

translation.en: and cater to over 50,000 people weekly,
translation.it: e più di 50.000 clienti a settimana,

translation.en: not to mention 30 years of experience that we have under our belt.
translation.it: per non parlare dei trent'anni di esperienza che abbiamo alle spalle.

translation.en: So I think that...
if there was some sort of merger between your company and ours,
translation.it: ...se ci fosse una specie di fusione tra le nostre compagnie...

translation.en: I think the sky will be the limit, sir.
That sounds like a well-rehearsed pitch, my dear.
translation.it: Mi sembra una pubblicità ben studiata, mia cara.

translation.en: It's not a pitch, sir.
Then convince me. Why should my company match with yours?
translation.it: Allora mi convinca. Perché la mia compagnia dovrebbe fondersi con la sua?

translation.en: Well, sir...
I grew up in a bus park.
My father started taking me to work way before I could crawl.
translation.it: Mio padre ha iniziato a portarmi al lavoro prima ancora che gattonassi.

translation.en: I saw people come and go,
translation.it: Ho visto andare e venire tante persone...

translation.en: each with their own different agendas.
[Adaeze] You see,
family is a core value upon which Lionheart was built.
translation.it: ...la famiglia è la base su cui la Lionheart è stata costruita.

translation.en: I understood this early and as I've grown older,
I have realized that our growth is based on how we treat others.
translation.it: ...ho capito che la nostra crescita si basa su come trattiamo gli altri.

translation.en: The same way you have, sir.
translation.it: E per voi è lo stesso, signore.

translation.en: Your grandfather built Maikano Motors 65 years ago.
translation.it: Suo nonno ha costruito la Maikano Motors 65 anni fa.

translation.en: Then he passed it on to your father and now, you wear the crown.
translation.it: Poi l'ha lasciata a suo padre, e ora la corona è sua.

translation.en: You do understand the importance of succession and longevity.
translation.it: Lei capisce l'importanza di successione e longevità.

translation.en: You've done quite some research.
Sir.
Maikano motors is one of the leading transport companies.
translation.it: ...la Maikano Motors è una delle maggiori compagnie di trasporti.

translation.en: I mean with emphasis to the North.
But, Lionheart Transportation is the heart and the soul of the Southeast.
translation.it: Ma i Trasporti Lionheart sono il cuore e l'anima del sudest.

translation.en: My belief is that...
with your capital and our technical know-how,
translation.it: ...col suo capitale, e le nostre conoscenze tecniche...

translation.en: if we come together as one,
we would be a force to be reckoned within the transportation business.
And not to mention...
translation.it: Per non parlare del fatto che...

translation.en: most importantly, we share the same values.
translation.it: ...cosa più importante, condividiamo gli stessi valori.

translation.en: [Hamza] So, how did it go with my father?
translation.it: Allora, com'è andata con mio padre?

translation.en: [Adaeze] Reasonably well, I believe.
Though he says he has to think on it, so, fingers crossed.
translation.it: Però dice che deve pensarci su, perciò incrociamo le dita.

translation.en: [Hamza] He's never been one to make hasty decision.
translation.it: Non è il tipo che prende decisioni avventate.

translation.en: No, he said the same thing.
But I really do believe that this would be a mutually beneficial deal
translation.it: Ma credo davvero che questo accordo sarebbe vantaggioso per tutti,

translation.en: if it does go through.
I... I think so too.
So thank you.
I don't know if I have thanked you for everything.
translation.it: Non so se l'ho ringraziata per tutto.

translation.en: We wouldn't have come this far if you hadn't, you know--
translation.it: Non saremmo arrivati fin qui se lei non...

translation.en: Stop. Stop thanking me. I know exactly what it's like to be in your shoes.
translation.it: La smetta di ringraziarmi. So come ci si sente, nei suoi panni.

translation.en: Is that so? How come?
You see, for starters, this isn't just a business for you.
translation.it: Vede, per cominciare, per lei non è solo lavoro.

translation.en: This is personal.
This is your family.
This is about proving your worth to anyone who matters, especially your dad.
translation.it: Si tratta di dimostrare il suo valore a persone per lei importanti, soprattutto suo padre.

translation.en: I know what it's like to be living under their shadows.
translation.it: So com'è vivere nella loro ombra.

translation.en: They've done so much for us on a platter, and the only way...
translation.it: Ci hanno servito tutto su un piatto d'argento, e il solo modo

translation.en: to pay them back is to show that we can actually bring something to the table.
translation.it: per ripagarli è mostrare loro che possiamo renderci utili.

translation.en: How did you think I ended up in Enugu, almost scammed in a business
translation.it: Come pensa sia finito a Enugu, quasi truffato nel cercare un modo per permetterci di espanderci a est?

translation.en: I hoped would solve our in-roads to the East?
translation.it: un modo per permetterci di espanderci a est?

translation.en: I wanted to impress him so bad and earn his respect.
translation.it: Desideravo fare colpo su di lui, e guadagnare il suo rispetto.

translation.en: So yes, I understand.
So no need to keep thanking me.
translation.it: Non c'è bisogno che continui a ringraziarmi.

translation.en: I'm sure your father is proud of you.
translation.it: Sono certa che suo padre sia fiero di lei.

translation.en: We have to be going.
it's getting late and...
translation.it: Si è fatto tardi, non riusciremo a prendere l'ultimo volo,

translation.en: we can't make the last flight so we have to check into a hotel.
translation.it: Si è fatto tardi, non riusciremo a prendere l'ultimo volo, e ci serve un hotel. Ne conosc...

translation.en: -Can you rec-- -No, no,your things are in the car.
translation.it: No, i vostri bagagli sono in auto.

translation.en: I have instructed the driver to take you to our guest house.
translation.it: Ho detto all'autista di portarle nella dependance.

translation.en: -No, please, you've done enough already. -I insist.
translation.it: - No, per favore, ha già fatto abbastanza. - Insisto.

translation.en: Thank you.
You're welcome.
Thank you.
Thank you so much and Alhaji and we'll be hoping to hear from you.
translation.it: Grazie mille, Alhaji, speriamo di avere presto sue notizie.

translation.en: -It's okay. -Yes.
Alright, Adaeze.
[in Igbo] Did they provide transportation for us?
Yes. It's taking us to their guest house.
[in English] Thank you, Alhaji. Thank you. Thank you very much.
Kola.
Thank you.
[in Igbo] What's going on?
[in English] Nothing.
Honestly, your father is so stubborn.
translation.it: Accidenti, tuo padre è davvero testardo.

translation.en: I heard you're getting better.
Of course I'm getting better. Can't you see that?
translation.it: Certo che sto meglio. Non si vede?

translation.en: I'm not expected to die anytime soon.
translation.it: Non mi aspetto di morire molto presto.

translation.en: I'm getting better.
[in Hausa] The way things are turning out, I'll have to sleep over in this town.
translation.it: Visto come vanno le cose, dovrò dormire in questa città.

translation.en: If you need a place to stay,
translation.it: Se le serve un posto dove stare...

translation.en: I also have a guest house.
You understand Hausa?
I was born in Zaria.
I studied there.
We roamed the city.
To be honest, I enjoyed the yoghurt... and the millet cakes.
translation.it: Ad essere onesti, mi piacevano lo yogurt e le torte di miglio.

translation.en: That's surprising. It was us against the world.
translation.it: - È sorprendente. - Eravamo noi contro il mondo.

translation.en: [in English] You have to do something, because we're going to...
I promise you, they weren't doing that a minute ago.
translation.it: Te lo giuro, non facevano così un minuto fa.

translation.en: Ada-nna, why do you get yourself worked up for nothing?
translation.it: Ada-nna, perché ti agiti per niente?

translation.en: They are laughing. They are smiling, they are happy.
I see that.
No worries, let me join them.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti, mi unisco a loro.

translation.en: Right, I think it's about time we started this meeting.
translation.it: Ok, credo sia ora di cominciare questa riunione.

translation.en: -There's no point in waiting any longer. -Yes.
-Go ahead. -Three billion now is not something,
translation.it: - Procedete. - Tre miliardi non sono una cifra...

translation.en: you know, to pass on.
[Obiagu] Not so fast, not so fast.
Get out of this seat. Come on.
-Out. -Out of this seat.
Please, sit.
-[man] Mr. Chairman, welcome. -Thank you very much.
[Samuel] Chief.
What a surprise, Sir.
Yes, a wonderful surprise.
Anybody who is on trial
is offered an opportunity to defend himself
before his accusers, don't you think so?
translation.it: di fronte ai propri accusatori, non credi?

translation.en: Yes, Chief, but you are not under any trial here sir.
translation.it: Sì, Capo, ma lei non è sotto processo, signore.

translation.en: No, no, no. Come on, I'm under trial.
translation.it: Oh no, sì che lo sono.

translation.en: You...
you accused my family of...
incompetence, of ineptitude,
and not satisfied with that, to make matters worse,
translation.it: e non soddisfatto, per peggiorare le cose...

translation.en: you bring into my family this, this poor chap, this, this, this rascal.
translation.it: ...hai portato nella mia famiglia questo poveretto, questo... furfante.

translation.en: Chief Obiagu,
there is no need for name-calling here.
translation.it: ...non c'è bisogno di ricorrrere agli insulti.

translation.en: This is business.
No hard feelings.
No hard feelings.
[in Igbo] Pascal, you're an animal.
[in English] Insult me all you want. But...
it will not change what is about to happen here.
translation.it: ...non cambierà ciò che sta per succedere.

translation.en: My offer is up...
translation.it: La mia offerta è ancora valida...

translation.en: and you have lost.
If I were you, I wouldn't be too sure.
translation.it: Se fossi in te, non ne sarei così sicuro.

translation.en: You read it carefully.
Sorry, what, what, what's this?
It might help if you read.
Contract papers. We have a new offer on the table.
translation.it: È un contratto. Abbiamo una nuova offerta sul tavolo.

translation.en: In the past 30 years, my family has...
translation.it: Negli ultimi trent'anni, la mia famiglia ha...

translation.en: faced up to all sorts of challenges.
We are faced with another challenge.
The challenge, more trying this time,
translation.it: Questa sfida, più difficile delle altre...

translation.en: the challenge of change.
This talks about expansion.
You don't have the capital for that.
You think so? Yes, I know so.
translation.it: - È questo che pensi? - Sì. Lo so.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I would like to introduce to you
the newest shareholder of Lionheart.
Alhaji Danladi Maikano, and his son, Hamza.
translation.it: Alhaji Danladi Maikano e suo figlio, Hamza.

translation.en: That's impossible. Really?
We've struck a deal with Maikano Motors, to combine our fleet.
translation.it: Ci siamo accordati con la Maikano Motors per unire le forze.

translation.en: If you look at the contracts before you,
you will see that this is a mutually beneficial merger.
translation.it: vedrete che questa fusione è vantaggiosa per entrambi.

translation.en: One that allows us to explore and expand beyond the shores
translation.it: Ci permetterà di espanderci oltre le coste,

translation.en: without having to buy small buses.
translation.it: senza dover comprare dei pullman più piccoli.

translation.en: But, most importantly,
it allows us to retain control of Lionheart.
translation.it: ...ci permetterà di mantenere il controllo della Lionheart.

translation.en: Beautiful. Wonderful.
This is...
absolute rubbish.
[in Igbo] Are you still here?
-[in English] Get up! And out. -Your continued stay
is an extension of your irrelevance.
translation.it: non fai che aumentare la tua irrilevanza.

translation.en: Could you leave, please?
Beautiful baby.
[in English] Please.
Welcome, Maikano.
Thank you, my brother.
At this point, I must have to make an announcement.
translation.it: A questo punto, devo fare annuncio.

translation.en: I want to retire from my position
of MD and CEO
translation.it: di direttore generale e amministratore delegato...

translation.en: of this company.
I think I have groomed a successor,
translation.it: Credo di aver istruito un successore.

translation.en: my daughter Adaeze,
because I believe she has all the virtues
translation.it: Perché credo possegga tutte le virtù

translation.en: required to run this company.
In order to ensure that I am not inflicting her on you,
translation.it: Per assicurarmi di non imporvi la sua nomina,

translation.en: you just must might put this to vote, if you'd like to.
translation.it: potete metterla ai voti, se volete.

translation.en: -[Godswill] Oh, yes. Yes. -But I recommend her heavily.
translation.it: - Oh, sì. - Ma ve la consiglio caldamente.

translation.en: Why not.
All in support say "aye."
The ayes have it. There's no "nay."
translation.it: Gli "aye" hanno vinto. Non c'è nessun "nay".

translation.en: Well...
-My daughter. -Thank you, daddy.
[Godswill] Ada-nna.
-Thank you. -Congratulations.
May I?
[man] Congratulations.
[man] Hello.
Hello.
Alhaji. I hope you enjoy yourself.
-I intend to enjoy myself. -Beautiful.
[Adaeze] Can I get something...
What is it? Okay.
I'm tired.
By the way,
I want to change the carpet in that office.
That burgundy just does my head in.
translation.it: Quel bordeaux mi dà ai nervi.

translation.en: -Blue-- -I think you have an admirer, Ma.
What?
Stop staring, Onyinye.
Hi, Adaeze.
Hamza, hi.
How are you?
Very well. Are you... Are you having a good time?
Oh yeah, yeah.
I'm Onyinye. Leaving. [laughing]
translation.it: Io sono Onyinye. Me ne vado.

translation.en: [in Igbo] I thought he's into hip-hop?
Is this going to be good?
You don't know your son. You'll soon see what he'll do.
translation.it: Non conosci tuo figlio. Vedrai presto cosa vuol fare.

translation.en: -[in English] My brother! -Oh, okay.
[Obiora] Good evening, ladies and gentlemen.
First of all, I just want to say a big congratulations to my dad...
translation.it: Innanzitutto, voglio fare le congratulazioni a mio padre...

translation.en: on his retirement.
And I have a special song for you...
translation.it: E ho una canzone speciale per te.

translation.en: It's titled Obiagu.
[in Igbo] Open the gate.
You always underrate me!
-Isn't it the same work we do? -[horn honks rapidly]
Yet, you ask me to open the gate.
translation.it: Eppure il cancello lo fai aprire a me!

translation.en: Are you talking to me in that manner?
translation.it: Ti rivolgi a me con quel tono?

translation.en: It seems something is wrong with you.
